traits.name: Product Management Experience
traits.description: The candidate must have substantial experience managing B2B SaaS products, particularly those serving mid-market or enterprise customers.
signals: 5+ years of product management experience in B2B SaaS
Experience in fintech, payments, or finance/ERP tools
Experience supporting mid-market or enterprise customers

traits.name: Domain Expertise in Spend Management
traits.description: Familiarity with financial workflows related to corporate spending, including cards, accounts payable, and accounting processes.
signals: Experience with corporate cards
Experience with spend management
Experience with accounts payable automation
Experience with accounting workflows (e.g., closing the books, expense reconciliation)

traits.name: Product Strategy and Execution
traits.description: Ability to define product strategy, own the roadmap, and execute launches from discovery through iteration, maintaining high quality and compliance standards.
signals: Track record of owning 0→1 or major 1→N launches
Ability to simplify complex workflows or highly regulated domains
Work day-to-day with engineering and design to prioritize, scope, and ship high-impact features quickly

traits.name: Technical Acumen and Data Handling
traits.description: Comfort working with engineers on complex, data-heavy problems, especially those involving sensitive financial data and third-party integrations.
signals: Comfort working through technical and data-heavy problems with engineers
Experience with systems that handle sensitive financial data
Experience with integrations with third-party tools (ERPs, HRIS)

traits.name: Stakeholder Management and Communication
traits.description: Excellent ability to communicate clearly, influence multiple internal and external stakeholders, and advocate for product decisions.
signals: Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Ability to navigate and influence multiple stakeholders
Ability to influence C-suite executives at customer organizations

traits.name: Bias Toward Action and Ownership
traits.description: A proactive, results-oriented mindset suitable for a fast-paced, high-growth environment, focusing on measurable outcomes.
signals: Bias toward action, hustle, and ownership
Focus on measurable outcomes for customers and the business
Work in a fast-paced, high-growth environment

outreach.key_hook: Own and scale core spend management workflows (cards, expense management, AP) for a platform that helps customers save time and money and drives tens of billions of dollars in spend.
selling_points: Opportunity to drive product decisions affecting tens of billions of dollars in spend each year.
Work in a high-ownership, hybrid culture centered on mentorship and empowerment.
Ramp is the ultimate platform for modern finance teams, automating manual processes and helping businesses run healthier.
Focus on eliminating financial waste and busywork for finance teams.

traits.name: Backend Engineering
traits.description: The ability to design, implement, and operate scalable backend services and data pipelines using modern programming languages.
signals: 3+ years of professional software engineering experience building production systems
Strong experience with at least one backend language such as Python, Go, or Java
Familiarity with modern web technologies
Design and implement scalable backend services and data pipelines

traits.name: Cloud Infrastructure and Operations
traits.description: Experience designing and operating scalable services on major cloud providers, including familiarity with core infrastructure components and ensuring system reliability and observability.
signals: Experience designing and operating scalable services on a major cloud provider (AWS, GCP, or Azure)
Experience with databases, queues, and container orchestration
Continuously improve code quality, reliability, observability, and performance across the stack
Take part in the on-call rotation to ensure high availability and rapid incident response for critical systems

traits.name: Product Delivery and Collaboration
traits.description: The capability to work cross-functionally with product managers and designers to scope, build, and launch high-quality features from ideation to production.
signals: Collaborate with engineers, product managers, and designers to scope, build, and ship features
Proven track record of delivering high-quality features from ideation through launch in a fast-moving environment
Excellent communication skills and a collaborative, low-ego approach to working with cross-functional teams

traits.name: System Architecture and Technical Leadership
traits.description: The ability to participate in high-level technical discussions, drive architectural decisions, and lead complex engineering projects.
signals: Participate in technical discussions, drive architectural decisions, and lead complex projects from design to production
Mentor less experienced engineers through code reviews, pairing, and design feedback

traits.name: Data and Integrations
traits.description: Comfort working with data models, APIs, and integrating with internal or external third-party platforms.
signals: Comfortable working with data models, APIs, and integrations with third-party tools or internal platforms
Data pipelines that power reporting, automation, and real-time decisioning

traits.name: Fintech/B2B SaaS Domain Experience
traits.description: Prior professional experience working within the financial technology, B2B software, or financial operations space.
signals: Experience in fintech, B2B SaaS, or financial operations products (e.g., payments, cards, accounting, or spend management)

traits.name: Infrastructure as Code (IaC) and Observability
traits.description: Familiarity with tools used for managing infrastructure programmatically and advanced observability stacks for large-scale systems.
signals: Familiarity with Infrastructure-as-Code tools such as Terraform
Observability stacks for large-scale systems

traits.name: Full-Stack/Frontend Capability
traits.description: The ability to contribute to the frontend stack when necessary, demonstrating versatility across the entire application.
signals: Frontend experience with React or similar frameworks to contribute across the stack when needed

outreach.key_hook: Help build the next generation of finance automation products used by thousands of businesses to manage spend, close their books faster, and operate more efficiently.
selling_points: Opportunity to shape products that help companies save time and money by automating spend management and accounting workflows.

company.name: Ramp
company.tagline: Spend Management, Corporate Cards & Accounts Payable
company.product_description: Ramp provides a platform for spend management, corporate cards, and accounts payable.
company.problem_solved: It powers finance operations on one intuitive platform.
company.target_customers: Businesses, particularly those in the tech industry looking for FinOps solutions.
recent_news: Ramp Reaches $32 Billion Valuation, Doubling Revenue and Customers in Past Year
We raised $500M to build the future of finance
interesting_facts: Ramp reached a $32 billion valuation, doubling its revenue and customer base in the year leading up to November 2025.
The company raised $500M to build the future of finance.
potential_selling_points: Working at a company valued at $32 billion that is rapidly doubling its revenue and customer base.
Opportunity to build the future of finance on a unified spend management platform.

traits.name: Software Engineering Experience
traits.description: The candidate must have professional experience building and shipping reliable applications using modern development tools and infrastructure.
signals: 3+ years of professional experience in a software engineering role.
Experience shipping fast, reliable applications using modern development tools and infrastructure.

traits.name: Startup Adaptability and Pace
traits.description: The ability to thrive in a fast-paced startup environment, iterate quickly, and respond effectively to new information and ambiguous situations.
signals: Ability to thrive in a fast-paced startup environment and iterate quickly in response to new information.
A bias toward pragmatic, impact-focused solutions over idealized architectures in ambiguous situations.

traits.name: Problem Solving and Pragmatism
traits.description: Strong skills in solving complex problems, improvising when standard methods fail, and prioritizing pragmatic, impact-focused solutions.
signals: Strong problem-solving skills and comfort improvising when standard approaches do not work.
A bias toward pragmatic, impact-focused solutions over idealized architectures in ambiguous situations.
Make pragmatic build-vs-buy decisions for tools and systems that support growth operations.

traits.name: Growth and Sales Tooling Experience
traits.description: Prior experience working specifically within growth engineering, or building tools for sales and marketing teams.
signals: Prior experience in growth, sales tooling, or marketing engineering.

traits.name: Data and Experimentation
traits.description: Familiarity with the platforms and pipelines used to support growth teams, including running experiments and analyzing data.
signals: Familiarity with experimentation platforms, analytics tooling, and data pipelines that support growth teams.
Design and run experiments, using metrics to guide iteration and investment decisions.

outreach.key_hook: Build the applications that power nearly every growth channel at Ramp, directly impacting user and revenue growth.
selling_points: Work on systems at the frontier of sales technology, turning raw data into actionable insights.
Opportunity to build software that helps Ramp reach its next millions of users across self-serve and sales-led channels.
Scale sales and marketing functions through custom internal applications, automation, and AI-assisted workflows.
High ownership and measurable business impact in a fast-paced startup environment.

Ramp is focused on building the future of finance, utilizing AI in its platform.
